FSys Class Reference
System Settings

Documentation

This allows applications to access system settings.

#include <fogo/Light.hpp>
#include <fogo/FSys.hpp>
//Set the light to high brightness
Light::set_brightness( Sys::brightness_high() );

Definition at line 30 of file FSys.hpp.

Definition at line 71 of file FSys.hpp.

Member Function Documentation

static void FSys::launch ( const char *  path,
const char *  args = 0 
)
static

This method launches a new app

The following snippet launches the Status app (home screen)

FSys::launch("/home/sys/app/Status");
Parameters
pathPath to app that is launched
argsArguments for app (passed to main())
static int FSys::powerdown ( u32  delay = 0,
u32  wakeup = 0 
)
static
Parameters
delayThe number of milliseconds to delay before turning off
wakeupThe number of milliseconds to wait before turning back on (0 to stay off indefinitely)
Returns
Zero on success.
static void FSys::save_settings ( void  )
static

When this method is called, any pending changes to system settings will be made permanent (written from RAM to EEPROM)

static void FSys::tilt_set_enable ( bool  v = true)
static

When this is enabled, the flashlight will adjust between low brightness when pointed toward the ground and high brightness when pointed upward.

Parameters
vtrue to enable and false to disable
static enum sys_units FSys::units ( )
static

Converting functions use this to convert various values based on the measuring system in use.
